
## SEO & Multitenancy Checklist

- [ ] All new pages include `SEO` component with canonical URL
- [ ] Structured data (Schema.org) added for new content
- [ ] Meta descriptions 120-160 characters
- [ ] Images use `ImageOptimized` component
- [ ] Sitemap updated if routes changed
- [ ] Internal links added to new content
- [ ] Tenant isolation verified in database queries
- [ ] No cross-tenant data leakage
- [ ] Mobile responsive (tested at 375px width)
- [ ] Core Web Vitals acceptable (LCP < 2.5s)
- [ ] Security headers present
- [ ] Rate limiting applied to new public endpoints
